core.bluetooth

Interface IConnectable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MbtBluetooth, MbtBluetoothA2DP, MbtBluetoothLE, MbtBluetoothSPP

    public interface IConnectable
    Interface used to connect to or disconnect from a bluetooth peripheral device

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean connect(android.content.Context context, android.bluetooth.BluetoothDevice device)
      Connect to the peripheral device
      boolean disconnect(android.bluetooth.BluetoothDevice device)
      Disconnect from the peripheral device
      void notifyStateChanged(BtState newState)
      Method used to notify that the connection state has changed

    • Method Detail

      • connect

        boolean connect(android.content.Context context,
                android.bluetooth.BluetoothDevice device)
        Connect to the peripheral device
        Returns:
        true upon success, false otherwise

      • disconnect

        boolean disconnect(android.bluetooth.BluetoothDevice device)
        Disconnect from the peripheral device
        Returns:
        true upon success, false otherwise

      • notifyStateChanged

        void notifyStateChanged(@NonNull
                        BtState newState)
        Method used to notify that the connection state has changed
        Parameters:
        newState - The new bluetooth connection state. Refer to @BtState for the complete list of states.
